name: BGTTokenInputView
summary: A custom TokenView which is similar to iMessage To function. This code is a swift3 rewrite of CLTokenInputView.
description: This is a TokenView which is similar to iMessage To function. The original code is a Object-C code from https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/CLTokenInputView. There is also a Swift3 version https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/FA_TokenInputView. This code is basically from it. Some functions are deleted, and some bugs are fixed. Install library into project, never have to wrtie these code again.
